verses.roman:
sa āha devaṁ giriśam
upādhāvāśu siddhyasi
yo 'lpābhyāṁ guṇa-doṣābhyām
āśu tuṣyati kupyati

synonyms: saḥ—he (Nārada); devam—the lord; giriśam—Śiva; upādhāva—you should worship; āśu—quickly; siddhyasi—you will become successful; yaḥ—who; alpābhyām—slight; guṇa—by good qualities; doṣābhyām—and faults; āśu—quickly; tuṣyati—is satisfied; kupyati—is angered.
translation: Nārada told him: Worship Lord Śiva and you will soon achieve success. He quickly becomes pleased by seeing his worshiper's slightest good qualities—and quickly angered by seeing his slightest fault.
